Detailed Description

One layer of the SFOP scale space.

There are two steps for detecting features in one layer:

  1. Construct a layer of the SFOP scale space from the input image, layer and octave indices.
  2. Detect local maxima given the upper and lower neighboring layer.

Detect features in this layer.

Find maxima in 3D scale space and optimize pixel position like Lowe2004

Parameters:
[in,out]f_features_pFeature set to push back new features
[in]f_below_pCLayer located below in scale (smaller sigma)
[in]f_above_pCLayer located above in scale (larger sigma)
